title: Nasdaq closes above 7,000

organizations.name: reuters news agency | brand attribution guidelines | careers  reuters

text:
Nasdaq closes above 7,000 3:22am IST - 01:05 
Energy and tech stocks drove the markets higher on the first trading day of 2018. Fred Katayama reports.
